items.Title: Survey
items.Details:
Hi Survivors!

We hope you have enjoyed Free Fire so far! We would like to know more about you to improve your game experience. Please fill in this survey! Thanks!

items.Title: Protect Now!
items.Details:
Hi, Survivors!  

Want a solution to protect and never lose your account? Make sure you are bound to more accounts so whenever you lose access from one, you can still play Free Fire with your own account!  

How? By doing [FFB300]Multiple Binding[-] of course!  nStep 1 Click [FFB300]Go To[-] below, or directly go to [FFB300]Settings[-] 
Step 2 Find [FFB300]Account[-] 
Step 3 [FFB300]Bind your account with multiple logins![-] 

Also, do the following things to make your account even more secure: 
1. Don't share your account or password with anyone \ n2. Do not use the same password as your other accounts  \ n3. Doing a 2-Step Verification for you account  

If your free fire is linked to a platform that has been hacked, you can log out from all devices feature from in-game  

If you have any issues with your account, please contact our Customer Support and we will gladly help you!

items.Title: Technical Support
items.Details:
Survivors!  

Please contact us via our technical support website if you need any help!  

Click Below and do not hesitate to tell us your problem, we're here to help you!

items.Title: Our Discord!
items.Details:
Hi Survivors!

Our own Discord server now welcomes you with news of events, tournaments and much more! 

You will have fun and meet new people, so join now!
